question: Which of the following are the chacteristics of a Mortgage Loan?
option1: It is secured against, immovable or fixed property.
option2: It is a long-term loan in nature.
option3: It is repaid in small monthly installments along with interest
explanation: A loan, secured by real property such as a building or land is called a mortgage loan. Housing finance also is provided in the same manner as mortgage lending. A housing loan has all the characteristics of a mortgage loan.
